message: By the way I´m building a Convore client in Delphi
Using Indy for the HTTP communication and Superobject to mange the json part
@pjblog what kind of projects do you develop in Delphi?
@pjblog Nice. In my country (Mexico) Delphi has been decreasing a lot in popularity. Is this happening also in your country?
I'm here too. It seems to be some kind of Delphi oasis in Brasil.
@salvadorhgr Great to see you here. I wonder if Rusia still hosts such a bunch of Delphi programmers as in past years
@norbux It could be, they should be doing something with the million Delphi academic licenses the bought some years ago, but maybe we could ask.
btw @norbux how is going that convore client that you were building?
@salvadorhgr it´s not going as fast as i´d like. I think I´ll give Nick Hodges´s THTMLWriter a try for printing the messages on a TBrowser instead of using a TRichEdit
nice to see Brazilian people in this group, your country is probably the most "Delphi friendly" country in the world these days

@salvadorhgr and I are from Mexico where Delphi is beeing decreasing in popularity. But there is still a bunch of good developers. By the way we have a good friend from Brazil, Andreano Lanusse from Embarcadero
